**Endpoint**: GET /point_of_sales

**Description**: Returns ProductPrice

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/point-of-sales/{pos_id}/product-prices/{search_value}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

pos_id (Int32, Mandatory)

search_value (String, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/point-of-sales/1000000/product-prices/Peat' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'
 ```

**Description**: Returns ListPointOfSales

**Endpoint**: GET /point_of_sales

**Description**: Returns ListProductPrice

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/point-of-sales/{pos_id}/product-prices

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

pos_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/point-of-sales/1000000/product-prices' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ1IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjowLCJBRF9PcmdfSUQiOjAsIkFEX1JvbGVfSUQiOjAsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA3NjU2MjksImV4cCI6MTcxMDg1MjAyOX0.JWAfP0P6I-b8oqWK8EEIBsq1K7Nzjx_IdMoD91GLXV4'
 ```

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /point_of_sales

**Description**: Returns Order

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/point-of-sales/{pos_id}/orders

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params)**

pos_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Parameters (Body)**

sales_representative_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/point-of-sales/1000000/orders' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ1IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjowLCJBRF9PcmdfSUQiOjAsIkFEX1JvbGVfSUQiOjAsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA3NjU2MjksImV4cCI6MTcxMDg1MjAyOX0.JWAfP0P6I-b8oqWK8EEIBsq1K7Nzjx_IdMoD91GLXV4' \
--data '{
    "sales_representative_id":102
}'

 ```

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /point_of_sales

**Description**: Returns ListBanks

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/point-of-sales/{pos_id}/bank-accounts/{bank_id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

bank_id (Int32, Mandatory)

pos_id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/point-of-sales/1000000/bank-accounts?bank_id=100' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU3IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfTGFuZ3VhZ2UiOiJlc19NWCIsImlhdCI6MTcxMDgwNjE2MSwiZXhwIjoxNzEwODkyNTYxfQ.O3igwtei8fHLMyOL5vm43pnH47e-4lR1jyLLQaUHfSw'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
  {
            "id": 100,
            "name": "MoneyBank 1234",

                "id": 0,

                "naics": "",

                "description": ""
            },
            "bank_account_type": "CHECKING",
            "bank_id": 100
        },

 ```
